# mediaItems

**Instance Property**

The media items to update.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaItems: [INMediaItem]? { get }
```

## Discussion

A media item such as a song, audiobook, or podcast episode. Although the array can contain more than one [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaItem] object, the system uses only the first item in the array. You set [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INUpdateMediaAffinityIntent/mediaItems] when creating the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMediaIntent] object.

## Getting the Media Information

- **affinityType**: The user’s affinity for the media item.
- **INMediaAffinityType**: Constants that describe a user’s affinity for a media item.
- **mediaSearch**: The type of item to search for.
